column4: is there anyway i can disable gnome? I want my system to start as a vanilla X server, with a black background? I want to start a slideshow application and dont want to run anything else, dont want popups or other "updates available" type messages ever coming up
yeah, then im left with figuring out how to auto login from the console
yeah, just don't load gdm at boot, or get gdm to just start x. but just on the side - kinda a waste don't you think?, if you can run gnome yet you just want a photo viewer
not sure what X's default window manager is called but it should be a choice, if not just log into cli/tty1 then just startx with no xinitrc file
